title: At least remove unit collision between allied champions
body: I'm tired of being slowed down because one of my teammates is in the same place and my champion can't figure out what's going on and moves in random directions

replies.body:
{{champion:412}}  Get out of the way i need to hook them!!!!
{{champion:56}}  (Doesn't move, keeps blocking me)
*weird movement slows us down*

{{champion:22}} *gets away laughing*

{{champion:412}}  -.-
{{champion:56}}  noob support
{{champion:412}}  wot?

{{champion:432}} *Tries to run away.*
**Minions** *Huddle in a circle to block path.*
{{champion:53}} *Sends out grab* Got you.
{{champion:432}} *Dies*
**Minions** {{item:3151}}

Rito, please fix this.
wot. how would blitz pull bard if bard is in a minion path! Talk about a non-magical journey!
I love this little skit. It's really funny and I own thresh and it's hard to hook when there are minnions

Gotta find the right position for max hooking potential. :D
I find that my allies and ally minions tend to hinder me the most in chasing and hooking. 
=/
Then your ADC lives in their allies tank and becomes basically untargetable all fight.
You see, a TANK is supposed to be a defensive thing, much like armor. That you wear. Or a TANK that you sit in. Yeah.
Good one, I actually thought you were taking this suggestion serious.
isn't that supposed to be the point of a tank...?
Untargetable ADCs are definitely not the point of a tank.

How does this have less upvotes than the OP lol

ADC conspiracy or just people not thinking through what it would do?

Also: stop making allied minions block you. Happended too often that I got "stuck" on a minion and couldn't get away as fast as I calculated... Emeny minions blocking is something I understand, but allied ones? That kinda sucks...
RIP phantom dancer and fizz passive
They would still enable you to move through enemy units, so... ^^
You would literally be dividing their value in half. HALF.

Phantom Dancer is usually bought for the stats it gives and almost never for the passive. Also Adcs don't have that problem as much as melee champs have it, so they would be barely affected anyways.

Fizz spends most of his time dashing through the enemy team. It wouldn't make a single difference for he would be still as powerful as he is now xD
You're more likely to spend time walking around your allies than enemies, but tru.
Or at least have them attempt to move out of your way >.>
I do like this idea. "Fellas coming through. Its your boss. Move your asses."

> [{quoted}](name=Sleeper Cell,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAOAHbHc,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-04-19T10:53:49.166+0000)
>
> Or at least have them attempt to move out of your way >.>

Now I'm picturing Sion in a princess bride themed skin.

"Everybody MOOOOOOVEE!"
That happened to me a lot. Someone in my team even called me "clicker retard".
6 stacks as Cho and still being slowed down by unit collision. I'm supposed to be a hulking monster not caring who gets in my way and I'm being slowed by 1ft tall yordles.
How often is this actually a problem though? I almost never experience this unless I'm deliberately trying to.

I experience this all the time in team fights, for instance I love to play Braum and be on the front line, but if i'm coming in and our top laner is engaged on someone tanking and I try to jump on the same champ I have problems, esp with Braum's 'W'.
Well I generally play long range immobile AP mids, so this literally never happens to me.
elixer of iron makes it hella cancer
Bot lane main here and I can't agree more.

I remember getting flamed as nautilus for slowing my allies down by walking on top of them.
There isn't a real reason why allies bump into each other.pls rito remove.

I agree with this. Unit collision makes sense when an opponent is trying to body-block you, or when trying to avoid merging hitboxes with Baron or Dragon, but otherwise it just doesn't really feel good at all. Blocking your own allies feels unnecessary and doesn't feel like it contributes anything positive, especially.

you understand that if you do so people can hide inside {{champion:31}} ?

even if I hate it too, removing unit collision from allied champs is not worth it (too many issues).

without this you will have an effect matrioska, that will make you rage more than you did in all your games.

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/nonciclopedia/images/2/2b/Ecografia_matrioska.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20120103092129
Phantom dancer = best passive (removes unit collison)

I agree to this.

Currently, 100% of my deaths are because my support has blocked me in some way, shape or form and I also lose CS because I cannot position my character around my support who is always rustling me.

> [{quoted}](name=Sky Shadow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAOAHbHc,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-04-19T11:41:41.655+0000)
>
> I agree to this.
> 
> Currently, 100% of my deaths are because my support has blocked me in some way, shape or form and I also lose CS because I cannot position my character around my support who is always rustling me.

The funny thing is, you're a support main according to your match history.  Soooo, 100% of your deaths are because of your support?  Makes sense.
more upvotes you fools
"Some motherfuckers are always trying to ice-skate up hill" - Blade(1998)
That's happened to me before and has gotten me killed, but that's what Leauge is all about
If you are dancing around minions, then you are spam clicking.  Like Mordekeisar says "You only need to click once, Summoner."
I still don't know why unit collision is a thing in this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Bussinessbacca,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAOAHbHc,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-04-19T02:08:21.971+0000)
>
> I still don't know why unit collision is a thing in this game.

Because {{champion:120}}

But then Cho Gath lvl 16 6stacks tank will hide the tiny teemo hitbox.
We can't have that, a live teemo, can we?

{{champion:48}}  Hey Draven?
{{champion:119}} Yeah?
{{champion:48}} You need to catch your axes,right?
{{champion:119}} Yup.
{{champion:48}} I'm going to support you.
{{champion:119}} ok.
{{champion:48}} You know im a troll right?
{{champion:119}} uh huh.
_Level 3 Hits_
{{champion:119}} FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU
{{champion:119}} THIS TRUNDLE IS A TROLL
{{champion:22}} No shit sherlock

Some champions actually have very little collision size in reguards to other champions on your team. Several times I've walked into the same spot as another champion and made a ugly mutant thing with the bad pathing the game has.

> [{quoted}](name=Elo Guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FAOAHbHc,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-18T22:17:39.372+0000)
>
> I'm tired of being slowed down because one of my teammates is in the same place and my champion can't figure out what's going on and moves in random directions

Be glad you don't play Heroes of the storm ^_^

This one time I tried playing azmodan (about as big as a 4-6 stack cho'gath at a guess), and two enemy stealthies stood behind me equidistant from each other and it wouldn't even path around them AT ALL, I was just stuck walking back and forth vertically not getting any closer to safety.

never again...

Better than playing j4
and EQing and then your flag stuffs you into a wall until it disappears.
My fucking god it happens once a game I swear.
Or pressing E and then just walking by it when its near a wall and suddenly it becomes an impassable fuck you and you your char just glitches into it until it disappears...like...wtf
{{champion:31}} {{item:2138}}
